name: Shadow Hero - Idle Fighter
description:
[Game Features]
- The original graphic to experience the first time!
- Easy and easy to combat automatic! Crazy speed!
- Item Farming! Random option! Item setting!
- Look for the big hit item! Gamble Box!
- Look for the strongest hunter! Match mode!
- Endless item growth! Shadow Cube!
- Extreme option setting! Enchanting!
